content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Company may transfer your personal information, including any sensitive personal data as necessary and to the extent permitted by law, to third parties for the processing purposes set out in section 1.3 as follows:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Within the EPAM Group of Companies:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" As part of our global structure, employee managers or certain regional or global departments may be located at other EPAM group entities. Therefore, our parent entity in the United States and other EPAM entities within the global EPAM group of companies may receive your personal data such as in order to administer the workforce, monitor and ensure compliance with applicable EPAM procedures, and respond to and comply with requests and legal demands. In order to provide adequate protection for such personal data transfers, EPAM implements organizational and technical security measures and data transfers agreements including those based on the EU standard contractual clauses and similar forms deemed adequate by the European Commission and relevant authorities.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With certain third parties:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Existing or potential business partners, suppliers, customers, independent external advisors (e.g., auditors, lawyers, payroll provider), banks, insurance carriers, benefits providers, and other third parties may also receive your personal data as necessary in connection with our business operations, in particular to carry out our contractual relationships with such third parties, to administer and provide compensation, administer and provide applicable benefits and other work-related allowances, administer the workforce, comply with applicable laws and employment-related requirements, communicate with employees and third parties, to comply with corporate financial responsibilities, and respond to and comply with requests and legal demands.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With our Customers\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": If you work on customer projects, we may provide the customer with a description of your experience or a copy of your resume, with or without your name, but after removing your personal contact information. You might be asked to participate in interviews with our customer for the purpose of onboarding you on a customer project. Once you have been provisionally selected for a client project and before you can start on the project, there may be a requirement for you to undergo background checks which may be carried out by us, the customer or a third party, or for us to confirm to the customer that you have successfully passed any required background checks, always subject to applicable law. We may provide the customer with a statement confirming passing of background checks. During your cooperation with the customer, we may share data including but not limited to information about your performance and feedback, as well as fees, work time, work schedule, absences, billing data and fees, and termination of your work on the project. The information is shared on the basis of legitimate interest of the Company and/or the customer.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With certain acquiring or acquired entities:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" If the EPAM business for which you work is sold or transferred in whole or in part or if EPAM is acquiring and integrating another entity into the EPAM business for which you work (or any similar transaction is being contemplated), your personal data may be transferred to the other entity (e.g., the new employer, potential new employer, the new acquired entity, or potential new acquired entity) prior to the transaction (e.g., during the diligence phase) or after the transaction, subject to any rights provided by applicable law, including jurisdictions where the other entity is located.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With personal information processors:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Certain third parties, whether affiliated or unaffiliated, may receive your personal data to process such information under appropriate instructions (\\\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data Processors\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\") as necessary to support and facilitate the processing purposes. The Data Processors will be subject to contractual obligations to implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to safeguard your personal data, and to process your personal data only as instructed and to provide adequate protection to personal data transfers.Â \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}}"
